physical_appearance: This is a chakla or a hanging textile. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The chakla is decorated with stylized foliage, animals, and three deity figures. The chakla is in the shape of a five-sided figure, with a higher triangular top and square bottom.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) foliage (motif) birds (motifs) deities depictions (visual works) beadwork (visual works)
